Name: Orbicularis oculi
Location: Around the eye (orbital and palpebral regions)

Name: Buccinator
Function: Compresses cheeks (e.g. in blowing); assists mastication

Name: Palatopharyngeus
Function: Elevates pharynx and larynx during swallowing

Name: Mylohyoid
Function: Elevates floor of mouth and hyoid

Name: Serratus anterior
Function: Protracts scapula; holds it against thorax

Name: Rhomboid minor
Function: Retracts scapula; rotates it to depress glenoid cavity

Name: Rhomboid major
Function: Retracts scapula; rotates it to depress glenoid cavity

Name: Multifidus
Function: Stabilizes vertebrae; extends and rotates spine

Name: External oblique
Function: Compresses abdomen; flexes and rotates trunk

Name: Internal oblique
Function: Compresses abdomen; flexes and rotates trunk

Name: Coracobrachialis
Function: Adducts and flexes arm at shoulder

Name: Triceps brachii (long head)
Function: Extends forearm; extends arm at shoulder

Name: Extensor digitorum (communis)
Location: Forearm (humerus to extensor expansions of digits 2–5)

Name: Lumbricals (4)
Location: Hand (flexor tendons to extensor expansions of digits 2–5)
Function: Flex MCP joints and extend IP joints

Name: Sartorius
column7: and laterally rotates thigh; flexes knee

Name: Rectus femoris
Function: Flexes thigh at hip; extends leg

Name: Adductor magnus
Function: Adducts thigh; anterior fibers flex thigh

Name: Lumbricals (4)
Function: Flexes MTP joints; extends IP joints

Name: Lower esophageal sphincter
Function: Closes off stomach, preventing acid reflux

Name: Pyloric sphincter
Function: Regulates passage of chyme into duodenum

Name: Sphincter of Oddi
Function: Regulates flow of bile and pancreatic secretions

Name: Ileocecal sphincter
Function: Prevents backflow from colon to small intestine

Name: Muscularis of esophagus
Function: Propels food toward stomach by peristalsis

Name: Muscularis of stomach
Function: Churns food and propels chyme toward intestines

Name: Ureteric smooth muscle
Function: Propels urine toward bladder by peristalsis

Name: Arterial tunica media smooth muscle
Function: Regulates vessel diameter and blood pressure

Name: Arteriolar precapillary sphincters
Function: Controls blood flow into capillary beds

Name: Fallopian tube muscularis
Function: Propels ova toward uterus by peristalsis

Name: Vas deferens muscularis
Function: Propels sperm toward urethra during ejaculation

Name: Atrial myocardium
Function: Contracts to push blood into ventricles

Name: Ventricular myocardium
Function: Contracts to pump blood to lungs (right ventricle) or body (left ventricle)

Name: Interventricular septum (muscular)
Function: Separates ventricles and conducts electrical impulses

Name: Sinoatrial (SA) node
Function: Initiates heartbeat (pacemaker) and sets heart rate

Name: Atrioventricular (AV) node
Function: Delays impulse between atria and ventricles

Name: Bundle of His (AV bundle)
Function: Conveys impulses from AV node into ventricles

Name: Purkinje fibers
Function: Rapidly conduct impulses to ventricular muscle

Name: Papillary muscles
Function: Anchor chordae tendineae; prevent valve prolapse during contraction
